verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You, whose name is holy
You are welcome here
Welcome, welcome
You have come into our hearts
Welcome, welcome
You have brought us joy
With your splendor you have brought
A great light to us

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You, whose name is holy
You have favored us
You favored, you favored
You have favored us
You favored us
You have brought your Spirit
You gave yourself who is love
And benevolence

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You, whose name is holy
Welcome here
Welcome, you are here
Welcome, you have brought joy
Welcome, welcome
You have brought us joy
Love, joy, happiness and peace
You have brought to us
